info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:48PM EDT until August 04 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Otsego County in central New York... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 348 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hartwick, or 8 miles southwest of Cooperstown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Middlefield, Hartwick, Cooperstown, Westville, Springfield, Westford, Milford, Laurens, Bowerstown and Elk Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
